laboratory_examinations.findings: Risk for short chain acyl-CoA dehydrogenase deficiency and isobutyryl Co-A dehydrogenase deficiency
Ethylmalonic aciduria (suggests SCAD deficiency and mitochondrial respiratory chain defects)
Mild elevation of propionylcarnitine (C3), butyryl/isobutyryl carnitine (C4), and octanoyl carnitine (C8)
Motor axonal polyneuropathy without acute denervation
Widespread myofiber atrophy with mild fiber-type grouping and a marked increase in esterase staining, suggestive of a neurogenic pathology

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Staining for succinate dehydrogenase and cytochrome C oxidase
laboratory_examinations.findings: Occasional small foci of subsarcolemmal staining in scattered fibers, which is nonspecific or suggestive of mitochondrial dysfunction

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Brain MRI and magnetic resonance spectroscopy
